acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused Rahmat Ali @ Rahman Ali is present. PWs namely  Miss Anjuma Begum and Mrs. Roiman Nesa are present. They are examined, cross-examined and discharged. Considering the evidence on record I am of the opinion that examination of  further PWs will not serve the purpose. Hence evidence for the prosecution is closed and examination of the accused person under section 313 CrPC  is dispensed with. Heard arguments. The Judgment is pronounced and delivered in the open court. The Judgment is prepared in separate sheets. In the result I find that the prosecution has miserably failed to prove its case against the accused person. Hence he is hereby acquitted from the charges brought against him. Let him set at liberty forthwith. The bail bonds shall remain cancelled after six months.          Accordingly this case is disposed of on contest.
